UAPPDependencies Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAPPDependencies.h
UAPPDependencies.m

Overview

UAPPDependencies provides base class for Injecting uApp dependencies. Any uApp can inherit this base class and inject dependencies for their component.
